name: 2.4.0 Release
body:
## What's Changed
* Update Python, pyenv and migrate to GAR by @kuenishi in https://github.com/pfnet/pfio/pull/283
* HTTPCache feature by @y1r in https://github.com/pfnet/pfio/pull/282
* detail=True option for listing directory or prefix by @kuenishi in https://github.com/pfnet/pfio/pull/284
* detail=True option for listing zip internals by @kuenishi in https://github.com/pfnet/pfio/pull/285
* Support write mode in S3+ZIP by @kuenishi in https://github.com/pfnet/pfio/pull/289
* Bump version by @kuenishi in https://github.com/pfnet/pfio/pull/290

## New Contributors
* @y1r made their first contribution in https://github.com/pfnet/pfio/pull/282

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/pfnet/pfio/compare/2.3.0...2.4.0

name: 2.4.0rc1
body:
## What's Changed
* Update Python, pyenv and migrate to GAR by @kuenishi in https://github.com/pfnet/pfio/pull/283
* HTTPCache feature by @y1r in https://github.com/pfnet/pfio/pull/282
* detail=True option for listing directory or prefix by @kuenishi in https://github.com/pfnet/pfio/pull/284
* detail=True option for listing zip internals by @kuenishi in https://github.com/pfnet/pfio/pull/285

## New Contributors
* @y1r made their first contribution in https://github.com/pfnet/pfio/pull/282

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/pfnet/pfio/compare/2.3.0...2.4.0rc1

## What's Changed
* Fix `BufferedReader` error caused by opening an empty file in S3 in "rb" mode by @belltailjp in https://github.com/pfnet/pfio/pull/270
* Sphinx 5 warns as language is None by @kuenishi in https://github.com/pfnet/pfio/pull/274
* Control buffering for underlying file object for Zip(FS) by @kuenishi in https://github.com/pfnet/pfio/pull/273
* Sparse file local cache by @kuenishi in https://github.com/pfnet/pfio/pull/275
* Thread safety by @kuenishi in https://github.com/pfnet/pfio/pull/277
* Multiprocessing-safe sparse file cache by @kuenishi in https://github.com/pfnet/pfio/pull/278
* Limit the sparse cache size by @kuenishi in https://github.com/pfnet/pfio/pull/279
* Release by @kuenishi in https://github.com/pfnet/pfio/pull/280
* Bump version by @kuenishi in https://github.com/pfnet/pfio/pull/281


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/pfnet/pfio/compare/2.2.0...2.3.0

name: 2.3.0rc1
body:
## What's Changed
* Fix `BufferedReader` error caused by opening an empty file in S3 in "rb" mode by @belltailjp in https://github.com/pfnet/pfio/pull/270
* Sphinx 5 warns as language is None by @kuenishi in https://github.com/pfnet/pfio/pull/274
* Control buffering for underlying file object for Zip(FS) by @kuenishi in https://github.com/pfnet/pfio/pull/273
* Sparse file local cache by @kuenishi in https://github.com/pfnet/pfio/pull/275
* Thread safety by @kuenishi in https://github.com/pfnet/pfio/pull/277
* Multiprocessing-safe sparse file cache by @kuenishi in https://github.com/pfnet/pfio/pull/278
* Limit the sparse cache size by @kuenishi in https://github.com/pfnet/pfio/pull/279

Sparse file cache example with multiprocessing would be like:

```python
        import os
        from pfio.v2 import from_url

        with from_url("s3://bucket/your.zip",
                      local_cache=True, reset_on_fork=True) as fs:

          pid = os.fork()
          if pid:
            os.wait()
          else:
            with fs.open("file-in-zip.jpg", 'rb') as fp:
              data = rp.read()
```

```
$ sha1sum dist/pfio-2.3.0rc1*
782f5ef08f08e4de64dac5175b300bce3dd46a38  dist/pfio-2.3.0rc1-py3-none-any.whl
4d21ede0d89f059830d681b74b8c464febd567e4  dist/pfio-2.3.0rc1.tar.gz
```

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/pfnet/pfio/compare/2.2.0...2.3.0rc1

name: 2.2.0 Release
body:
Major updates:
- Python 3.6 dropped
- Default cache directory moved from `~/.pfio` to `~/.cache/pfio` in favor of XDG standard.
- New option `reset_on_fork` introduced to each FSes.

All:

- #260 by [kuenishi](https://github.com/pfnet/pfio/issues?q=is%3Aissue+author%3Akuenishi) was closed[ 1](https://github.com/pfnet/pfio/issues/260)4 minutes ago
- #266 by [kuenishi](https://github.com/pfnet/pfio/issues?q=is%3Apr+author%3Akuenishi) was merged 18 minutes ago
- #267 by [knshnb](https://github.com/pfnet/pfio/issues?q=is%3Apr+author%3Aknshnb) was merged 14 days ago
- #261 by [kuenishi](https://github.com/pfnet/pfio/issues?q=is%3Aissue+author%3Akuenishi) was closed 22 days ago
- #264 by [kuenishi](https://github.com/pfnet/pfio/issues?q=is%3Apr+author%3Akuenishi) was merged 22 days ago
- #226 by [kuenishi](https://github.com/pfnet/pfio/issues?q=is%3Aissue+author%3Akuenishi) was closed 22 days ago
- #265 by [kuenishi](https://github.com/pfnet/pfio/issues?q=is%3Apr+author%3Akuenishi) was merged 22 days ago
- #262 by [kuenishi](https://github.com/pfnet/pfio/issues?q=is%3Aissue+author%3Akuenishi) was closed 22 days ago
- #263 by [kuenishi](https://github.com/pfnet/pfio/issues?q=is%3Apr+author%3Akuenishi) was merged 22 days ago
- #259 by [kuenishi](https://github.com/pfnet/pfio/issues?q=is%3Apr+author%3Akuenishi) was merged on Jan 12

```
453ad4a231b87f64499ec70abcc02b80ac96b861d8e7ccea831760e6398fb26c  pfio-2.2.0-py3-none-any.whl
b7aff43978b9fbbd685c586d79ea7c1679d6dc8bef9052132c353a0945c21b6f  pfio-2.2.0.tar.gz
```

name: 2.1.2 Release
body:
- Prevent race condition for from_url(create=True) in case of parallel processing  cat:bug
  #254 by belltailjp was merged 20 minutes ago

name: 2.1.1 Release
body:
- Fix import degradation  cat:bug
 #251 by belltailjp was merged 1 hour ago

name: 2.1.0 Release
body:
Includes incompatible changes.

- Release/2.1 - remove v1 API
  #250 by kuenishi was merged 1 minute ago
- Provide 'create' option in each filesystem (v2 API)
  #245 by belltailjp was merged 2 hours ago
- Update Sphinx RTD theme  cat:document
  #249 by kuenishi was merged 7 days ago
- Buffered S3 reader  cat:enhancement
  #247 by belltailjp was merged 7 days ago
- File-like object returned from open_url is extremely slow with S3 cat:performance
  #241 by belltailjp was closed 7 days ago
- Fix S3.rename didn't correctly remove the old file  cat:bug
  #248 by belltailjp was merged 8 days ago
- Fix pfio.v2.Hdfs.isdir returns True to non-existent path  cat:bug
  #246 by belltailjp was merged 8 days ago

name: 2.0.1 Release
body:
- Opening a giant (exceeding 4GB~?) zip in S3 using pfio.v2.from_url raises "BadZipFile: Bad magic number for central directory" cat:bug
#239 by belltailjp was closed 3 hours ago
- Add readline method to _ObjectReader so S3 file object can be fed to pickle.load 
#243 by belltailjp was merged 3 hours ago
- [Ready] Fix _ObjectReader.seek(0, os.SEEK_END) case  cat:bug
#242 by belltailjp was merged 3 hours ago
- Path.glob has different behavior from standard pathlib.Path cat:bug
#235 by disktnk was closed 2 days ago
- Fix pathlib return value  cat:bug
#240 by kuenishi was merged 2 days ago
- xml.etree.ElementTree.Element.getchildren is abolished in python 3.9  cat:bug
#238 by belltailjp was merged 2 days ago
- Fix forkederror  cat:bug
#236 by kuenishi was merged 2 days ago
- Extend CI timeout 
#237 by kuenishi was merged 2 days ago

name: 2.0.0 Release
body:
https://pypi.org/project/pfio/2.0.0/

## Incompatible Deprecation

- V1 API #195 (will be removed in 2.1.0)

## Addition and Fixes
- Support Python 3.10 #227
- Support zipfile.is_zipfile itself or replacement feature in PFIO cat:feature #208
- Add zipfile.is_zipfile support  #230
- Loader bench  #229
- Bump and fix pyenv as 2.1.0, update Python versions  #228
- Read-only mmaped file cache  #224
- Set 0 to pyarrow.fs.HadoopFileSystem port in v2 API to make it consistent to the v1 API behavior  cat:bug #225 by @belltailjp 
- Support "zip" over S3 #220
- Treat prefix ending with "/" as directory  #219 by @HiroakiMikami
- Add force_type=None option to pfio.v2.from_url() cat:enhancement #211
- Use relative path as an argument of boto3  cat:code-fix #212 by @HiroakiMikami
- Add kwargs to open_url #210 by @HiroakiMikami 
- Make kwargs available in open_url too #217
- Fix bug in S3.list  cat:bug #213 by @HiroakiMikami
- pathlib-compat API cat:feature #192
- Fix typo #207 by @superbrothers
- Add .parent, .name, .suffix  #201
- Add pathlib-like API supporting glob and path concatination  cat:feature #199
- Fix listing root directory  #198

name: 2.0.0a3 Release
body:
- Add zipfile.is_zipfile support (#230)
- Add loader-bench #229 
- Bump and fix pyenv as 2.1.0, update Python versions (#228)
- Read-only mmaped file cache (Experimental, #224)
- Set 0 to HDFS port (#225), Thanks to @belltailjp 
- Support ZIP on S3 (#223)

name: 2.0.0a2 Release
body:
- `list()` now does not prints path prefix #213
- `pfio.v2.open_url()` supports keyword arguments as well as `from_url()` #217 
- Omit first `/`on using S3 #212
- Add `force_type` keyword argument to `open_url()` #218
- Imitate directory on path with trailing `/` #219

This pre-release has been realized by huge contribution from and discussion with @HiroakiMikami . Thanks!

name: 2.0.0a1 Release
body:
Alpha release

- New feature: `pfio.v2.pathlib`
- Depreaction: toplevel v1 API e.g. `pfio.open()`

Release: https://pypi.org/project/pfio/2.0.0a1/

Release notes

- #194 fix off-by-one bug on S3 multipart upload
- #193 Fix BufferedIOBase requires readinto() implemented
- #195 Schedule some of V1 APIs deprecation & remove Chainer extension code

- Update to pyarrow 4.0.1 #191
- Update to pyarrow new API #181 
- Several bugfix in 1.4

name: Release 1.4.3
body: Fix text mode readlines #189

name: 1.4.2 Release
body: Fix text mode readlines #189
Bugfix: Fix read(-1) call from S3 StreamBody #183

name: 1.4.0 Release
body:
Release notes:
- `pfio.v2.S3` has become now foolproof. When a process fork is detected and raises an error. (#175 )
- `chainerio` namespace has been removed. (#179 ) 
- Now `pfio.v2.S3` supports mutlipart upload. (#178 )
- Now fileobject from `pfio.v2.S3` supports `.seek()` method. (#170 )

Release note:
- #169 : Do not allow NFS for `FileCache` directory

Release notes:
- #165 Fix last_modified attr in S3ObjectStat 
- #166 Fix binary read and write of S3 objects 

Thanks to @HiroakiMikami for helping a lot.

Release notes:
- #162 Fix broken readers .closed property (S3)

name: 1.2.0 release
body:
Release notes:
- #151 File Access V2 API (experimental)
- #152 AWS S3 API Support (experimental)
- File Access V2 API addresses lots of past bugs and issues.

name: 1.1.0 Release
body:
- Python 3.5 support dropped and 3.9, 3.8 added
- Raise `IndexError` instead of assertion ( #136 )
- Introduce physical size limit to file cache ( #143 )
- In FileCache, index file and data file are merged to one ( #145 )
- Change behaviour of size limit exceed, and allow cache file overwrite (#138)

This release came into real definitely by @belltailjp . Thanks a lot!

name: 1.0.1 Release
body:
# Major changes include:

## Documentation and Style
1. Replace 'an URI' with 'a URI' (#121)
2. Fix typo (#122)
3. Fix style (#127)
4. Test documentation with Python3.7 (#132)
5. replace 'github.com/chainer/pfio' with 'github.com/pfnet/pfio' (#125 )

## New feature
1. MultiprocessFileCache for efficient and easy cache with pytorch dataloader (num_workers>0) (#128)

name: 1.0.0 Release
body:
The initial `pfio` release after renamed from `chainerio`.

## Major changes include:
### New Features: 
1. Renamed to `pfio` from `chainerio`. Import from both name are supported to keep the backward compatibility #118 
2. New designed unified `Filestat` object #114 (thanks to @belltailjp !) 

### Minor update:
1. Document grammatical update #121

name: 0.1.2 Release
body:
Major changes include:

Bugfix:

- Test fails when KRB5_KTNAME is not set #103 
- Close and reopen shared zip after forking based on pid #105 
- Fix HDFS unittest #108 
- list and isdir for non-directory-included zip #112

Dependency:
- Upgrade required `krbticket` version to 1.0.5 #107 #113 #115 

Refactoring:
- Refactoring test_zip_container to use parameterized #116

name: 0.1.1 Release
body:
This release is a bugfix release:

Bugfix

Get correct principal name when keytab is given #97
Use krbticket 1.0.2 to avoid issues when the keytab is not given #96

name: 0.1.0 Release
body:
Major changes include:

Bugfix

- Avoid sharing handlers #89 
- Raise ValueError when given unsupported filesystem type to `create_handler` #86 

Features
- Support Unnormalized path in zip ops: open #85, list #68, stat #82, isdir #83, exists #84
- Add persistence and multiprocess support to cache.FileCache #90
- Get HDFS keytab from environment value #91

name: 0.0.6 Release
body:
Major changes include:

Bugfix
- Listing zip https://github.com/chainer/chainerio/issues/66 https://github.com/chainer/chainerio/pull/47
- Unpickle performance degrade https://github.com/chainer/chainerio/issues/36 https://github.com/chainer/chainerio/pull/44
- Use valid username in HDFS https://github.com/chainer/chainerio/pull/65
- Prevent affecting root logger https://github.com/chainer/chainerio/pull/31

Features
- Recursive listing https://github.com/chainer/chainerio/pull/57
- Python 3.5.2 support https://github.com/chainer/chainerio/pull/53
- Nested zip support in Python < 3.7 https://github.com/chainer/chainerio/pull/40

name: v0.0.5
body:
# Enhancements

- Add documents and descriptions
- Add more tests
